results.abstract: Wendy Lesser article on learning to appreciate dance theater, a hybrid form that initially put her off; photo (M)

headline.main: Thanks, I Needed That: Learning to Like Being Jolted

results.snippet: FOR many years, the phrase ''dance theater'' made me want to run as fast as I could in the other direction.    Don't get me wrong. I've always been an avid theatergoer and a lover of good dance. But to my ear the phrase dance theater suggested...
results.lead_paragraph: FOR many years, the phrase ''dance theater'' made me want to run as fast as I could in the other direction. Don't get me wrong. I've always been an avid theatergoer and a lover of good dance. But to my ear the phrase dance theater suggested something tediously instructive or laxly improvised, something with a loud buzzing noise on the soundtrack, something Germanic and aggressively modern. So I kept away from Pina Bausch and her ilk.
